Text:
Finally a man that cares about quality.
Big thank you.
Another JMJ album would be nice too...

This is actually a 2 CD set and if wanted, I can do the set with FLAC for same quality. PM me please...

Actually, anyone who has played JMJ with a surroundsystem will enjoy MP3 version as much as a bad cold.
Knoppen,  make it's in flac please :)
